shortDescription: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.
longDescription: We should expect heavy resistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't saying what's in that facility, but whatever it is has them riled up.

dialogueContent.words: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.
We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.
Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.
You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.
There's that strong opposition, Commander. Watch your position and don't get flanked.
We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
